page.title: 08 Worlingham
page.content: Some main features in Worlingham are the manor,the church,the sign and the Worlingham hornbeam.There are two schools and a playschool.The playschool is for children aged 2-4,the primary is or children aged 4-9 and the middle schools for children aged 9-13.Every Sunday there is a Sunday market.There are 3 shops in Worlingham a butchers,a newsagents and a mace shop also there is a hairdressers and a garage.In Worlingham there is a pub called the Colville Arms.Lord Colville lives at the manor and he owns all the land about it.The land contains-plants,trees and lots of hidey-holes for small animals and lots more.
